mapper.insert: insert into abc_loan_intent_apply ( lia_intent_emp_type, lia_user_id, lia_user_name, lia_phone, lia_intent_money, lia_area, lia_note, lia_intent_time, lia_intent_status, lia_audit_time, lia_audit_opinion, lia_intent_rate, lia_intent_title, lia_intent_category, lia_intent_no, lia_intent_use, lia_intent_period, lia_intent_period_unit, lia_intent_paytype, lia_loan_id, lia_file_url) values ( #{liaIntentEmpType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liaPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liaIntentMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{liaArea,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{liaIntentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaAuditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{liaAuditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liaIntentRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{liaIntentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liaIntentCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaIntentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liaIntentUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{liaIntentPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaIntentPeriodUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaIntentPayType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaLoanId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{liaFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update abc_loan_intent_apply
lia_intent_emp_type = #{liaIntentEmpType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_user_id = #{liaUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_user_name = #{liaUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lia_phone = #{liaPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lia_intent_money = #{liaIntentMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lia_area = #{liaArea,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_note = #{liaNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lia_intent_time = #{liaIntentTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lia_intent_status = #{liaIntentStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_audit_time = #{liaAuditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
lia_audit_opinion = #{liaAuditOpinion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lia_intent_rate = #{liaIntentRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lia_intent_title = #{liaIntentTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lia_intent_category = #{liaIntentCategory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_intent_no = #{liaIntentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lia_intent_use = #{liaIntentUse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lia_intent_period = #{liaIntentPeriod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_intent_period_unit = #{liaIntentPeriodUnit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_intent_paytype = #{liaIntentPayType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_loan_id = #{liaLoanId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lia_file_url = #{liaFileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where lia_id = #{liaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from abc_loan_intent_apply T1 where DATE(T1.lia_intent_time)=DATE(now())
and T1.lia_user_id =#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
